snippet: The F.B.I. said the man who was fatally shot by police at the National Security Agency was Ricky Hall, 27, of Baltimore, who had a criminal record.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation identifies man fatally shot by police at National Security Agency in Fort Meade, Md, as Ricky Hall; Kevin Fleming is identified as second man who was shot and wounded.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. said the man who was fatally shot by police at the National Security Agency was Ricky Hall, 27, of Baltimore, who had a criminal record.

headline.main: Man in Fatal Encounter With N.S.A. Is Identified
headline.print_headline: Man in Fatal Encounter With N.S.A. Is Identified
